v8:item.v8:content: Specify a price type to set new prices
Population with the relevant prices of the selected price kind as of the specified date will be performed
Population with the relevant counterparty prices of the selected price kind as of the specified date will be performed
Population of prices according to the basic price kind for the specified period will be performed, they will be increased by a percent
Prices will be increased or decreased by the specified percent
Prices will be increased or decreased by the specified amount in the tabular section price currency
Selected prices will be rounded off according to the set rules
If the selected supplier invoice contains products, price specified in the document will be set
Prices of the selected price kind will be missing in the price list for the selected products from the specified period
The last price as of the specified date will be removed according to the selected price kind for marked products.
The selected prices for products will be effective for the selected price type starting from
Fill in according to the selected price kind as of date
Calculate according to the basic price kinds
Fill in prices according to the supplier invoice
Fill in prices according to the counterparty price kind
